name: Prinsotel La Dorada

reviews.text: I have been to Mallorca 13 times now, and have visited a lot of nice hotels as Viva Mesquida and Viva Bahia. But I have no doubt about what is the best hotel. Prinsotel La Dorada is in another division.
reviews.title: Great service

likes.liked: — The standard and the very good service
likes.disliked: — The staffs bad english (except the staff in the reception)

reviews.text: The rooms are lovely, it is very clean, gives more than you expect, the pools are great and no one could get a sunbed before 9 o'clock. Every sunbeds have a "mattress".
reviews.title: mosquitohell La Dorada

reviews.text: The location next to the natural park is very good. And we did not see ONE mosquito.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel - Highly Recommended - No Faults At All!

reviews.text: But the best of all, was the service. If we had any problems, they helped us at once.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel, great for kids, superb pool! - Poor Location

likes.disliked: — the location, muro is not a great resort.

reviews.text: I needed to get a print from my email (because I had som work to do as a journalist), and Marisa in the reception let me use her office twice.
reviews.title: Very kid friendly !!

likes.liked: — the apartment was a higher standard than expected

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for two weeks between 29th Aug & 13th Sep, and thoroughly enjoyed the visit.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

likes.liked: — Size of Room and Hotel Facilities

reviews.text: Majorca is a fantastic island with lots to do and see.
reviews.title: Absolutely terrific!

reviews.text: We were also blessed with 12/14 days of glorious sunshine.
reviews.title: Again, Great For Kids!

reviews.text: I would recommend hiring a car as there are some amazing places to visit.
reviews.title: Fantastic place to stay - wish I was there!!!

reviews.text: I prefer to do things on my own time – not a fan of guided tours so car was a great option. We hired an automatic (lazy option) with 'Amego car hire' and got a great deal for the two weeks.
reviews.title: great hotel for families lots to do...

likes.liked: — plenty of sunbeds around very large pool
likes.disliked: — if it was on the beach it would have been excellent..

reviews.text: Returned from a two weeks at this hotel with my family (Wife and two teenage children) on 26 Jul. To say our stay was ruined within the first two days, would be an understatement. On arrival at 0100hrs we were told that our room had been given to someone else who wanted a move. After about 1 hour we were allocated another room and to be fair it was immaculetly clean, overlooking the pool, so I could forgive them for the mix up. What really spoiled our stay was the sandwiches we had from the bar on our second day. My wife has a habit of checking her food prior to eating it and on this occassion it was lucky she did as she found live maggots within the sandwhich. We brought this immediatly to the attention of the hotel manager, who after speaking to the Chef said "Thanks very much for letting us know, you can have whatever you want from the menu", my reply being "Thanks but no thanks". Suffice to say we did not eat in the hotel after this. To make matters worse, the sheets on our beds were supposed to be changed 3 times a week. After out fifth day I had to go and ask for them to be changed. The same happened in the second week, accept this time the maid, who clearly was not cleaning our room, gave my wife some verbal for complaining. In the end we cleaned our room ourself. Our complaints to the manager fell on deaf ears and at times he infuriated me. The hotel grounds were well looked after and the childrens entertainment was good, howvever if you value your families health I would avoid this hotel as it's cleanliness is purely cosmetic. The area around the hotel is quiet which is what we wanted. The local spars are v.expensive and the food in the bars is expensive and not particurarily nice. Our saving grace was the car we hired for two weeks which gave us the freedom to search out local cuisine and see the real spanish living as oppossed to Alcudia the Spanish Blackpool.
reviews.title: "Very Disappointed"

likes.liked: — The first day when it was clean
likes.disliked: — The maids lack of claening as the holiday progressed

reviews.text: Good Points:
reviews.title: 4 Star - I think not!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Weather was nice.
reviews.title: Was a picturesque, relaxing hotel- thumbs up!

likes.liked: — apartment was v.spacious and quiet location
likes.disliked: — trying to get a sun lounger was impossible!

reviews.text: - Good kids entertainment (under 7) especially the mini-disco.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel

likes.liked: — Pool and Accomodation and Friendly Staff

reviews.text: - Entertainment staff very friendly.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel!

likes.disliked: — I will say the nature reserve as I cant think of anything else it really wasnt that bad but I would request a pool view next time!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my fiancée stayed at the hotel one week during august 2008, with half board. The hotel is very nice, perfectly near a wonderful beach with beautiful cristal clear water. Although I wouldn't recommend the hotel to couples without children, since the hotel is totally devoted to making a vacation perfect for families with small children. Most of the pool area is suited for children and so are the hotel acitivities.
reviews.title: Not for couples

reviews.text: The food is OK, but we probably wouldn't get half board again. The restaurant is big and there are many things to chose from, and also if you like fried food and sausages and hamburgers for breakfast, and a lot of pork. With every meal, there are many fruits and deserts.
reviews.title: we had a great stay at prinsotel

reviews.text: If something negative should be mentioned I would say the cleaning hasn't been the best. Altogether we stayed six and a half days, and three out of these days the staff either forgot to put new towels or to leave blancet covers. Each time we had to call to the recepetion and sometimes it took them so long to get the missing stuff so we had to go down and get the towels ourselves.
reviews.title: Perfect if you want a quiet holiday

reviews.text: Also it says that the tennis is free for hotel guests but it's NOT. The tennis COURT is free, but it costs you 7 euros to rent rackets and balls, so bring your own rackets if you want to play tennis! It's not a big deal, but we always stay at at least 4 star hotels and never had to pay for suh activities before.
reviews.title: 2 great weeks at La Dorada!!!

reviews.text: Overall it was a nice hotel, perfect for families, and close to a wonderful sandy beach with turqoise water.
reviews.title: Good hotel and lovely beach

aka: Prinsotel La Dorada Hotel Playa De Muro
description: Prinshotel La Dorada is next to Mallorca’s Albufera Nature Reserve, 200 metres from the beaches of Alcudia Bay. Set in lush gardens, it features a large outdoor pool, sauna and gym.All air-conditioned apartments have a private balcony and a lounge with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom, and a kitchen area with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.The La Dorada complex has a sun terrace with loungers and parasols. There is a games room, and a court for playing tennis, basketball or volleyball. Daily evening entertainment is provided.There are 2 restaurants at the Prinsotel La Dorada, as well as a lounge bar and poolside bar.Prinsotel la Dorada has a 24-hour front desk, and Wi-Fi is offered for an additional charge. You can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk, and free parking is available nearby.
